scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Visitation, with the Virgin Mary, accompanied by an angel, greeting her cousin Elizabeth. Mary, on the left, is dressed in a dark robe and has her hands extended towards Elizabeth. Elizabeth, on the right, is seated and wears a wimple and a dark habit, her hands also extended in greeting. An angel stands to the left of Mary, with wings visible and dressed in a white robe. In the background, there are indications of architectural structures, possibly buildings or a city, rendered in a simplified manner. The overall composition is framed by an arched border.
